title: Dokidoki Ghost Mansion

alternative_titles.en: Pokémon Kids TV: Mysterious Ghost Manor
alternative_titles.ja: ドキドキ ゴーストマンション

synopsis:
Join Mimikyu as it explores a mansion filled with spooky scary Pokémon!
With Ghost type Pokémon haunting every nook and cranny of the mansion…
Will Mimikyu even make it back safe and sound?
Watch and find out!

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)
